### RISCVInstructionSelector() {#aa32b97c461cc2181e79e4e2dcdaa4c3b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>RISCVInstructionSelector::RISCVInstructionSelector (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvtargetmachine">RISCVTargetMachine</a> &amp; TM, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvsubtarget">RISCVSubtarget</a> &amp; STI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvregisterbankinfo">RISCVRegisterBankInfo</a> &amp; RBI)</>}>
Returns the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvcc/#a54a545c3f090650e4ae09e3174045976">RISCVCC::CondCode</a> that corresponds to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> CC.

CC Must be an ICMP <a href="/docs/api/classes/predicate">Predicate</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### select() {#a285142054aed60907906550e49ed07e2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RISCVInstructionSelector::select (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; I)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Select the (possibly generic) instruction <code>I</code> to only use target-specific opcodes.

It is OK to insert multiple instructions, but they cannot be generic pre-isel instructions.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
whether selection succeeded.
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
I.getParent() &amp;&amp; I.getParent()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#a1b8850f1ed44c12bc3501175a71c251c">getParent()</a>
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Postcondition">
if returns true: for I in all mutated/inserted instructions: !isPreISelGenericOpcode(I.getOpcode())
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvinstructionselector-cpp/#l00045">45</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvinstructionselector-cpp">RISCVInstructionSelector.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
